data: When the Diplomacy Bureau at home is composed of hopeless incompetents, the Venusians are rattling the sabre, and it looks as if an utterly senseless war is going to result, a little screwball stuff can be forgivenâ€”if it works!

When the Diplomacy Bureau at home is composed of hopeless incompetents, the Venusians are rattling the sabre, and it looks as if an utterly senseless war is going to result, a little screwball stuff can be forgiven--if it works!
Kornbluth, C. M. (Cyril M.), 1923-1958; Bok, Hannes, 1914-1964 [Illustrator]
